note:
Walker, nature lover, homebaker, bookworm, currently ‘between cats’, francophile, Remainer/Rejoiner, proud member of the wokerati.

Case officer for the Open Spaces Society, protecting public access to paths & open spaces.  
Views very much my own.
She/her.

fields.name: Profile pic
fields.value: Head shot of me - a middle-aged white woman wearing a green tweed hat, grey scarf and a dark winter jacket, standing in front of a green and brown moorland hillside.

fields.name: Banner
fields.value: Landscape photo of wild, wide open moorland under blue skies, a few puffs of white cloud. A path, bounded by granite marker stones, leading off into the distance.

fields.name: Just My Toots
